alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Marshall; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 1:40PM CDT until July 21 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi... Western Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 140 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lamar, or 10 miles northeast of Holly Springs, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lamar, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Theo, Michigan City, Slayden, Walnut, Ashland, Falkner, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Brody, Collinstown, New Canaan, Hamilton, Tiplersville, Hightown, Hudsonville, Crumtown and Early Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
